Translations.Text: Youyu renmen qinshou suo fan de zui'e, eguo yi xianxian yu ludi he haiyang, yibian ta [an la] shi tamen [zai jinshi] changshi yixie tamen suo fanzui e de chengfa, yibian tamen huiguo zi xin [zhu].
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen dang zai dadishang luxing, guancha qian ren de jieju ruhe! Tamen da duoshu ren shi bai ouxiang zhe.”
Zai buke kangju de rizi cong an la jianglin qian, ni [mu sheng] dang chedi gui xin zhengjiao [yisilan jiao]. Zai na ri, tamen [renlei] jiang bei fenkai [xinshi jin leyuan, bu xinyang zhe jin huo yu].
Shei bu xinyang, shei zi shou qi hai; shei xingshan, shei zhi wei ziji yubei [leyuan li] hao de guisu,
yibian ta [an la] yi ta de enhui baochou xinyang bing xingshan zhe. Ta jue bu xihuan bu xinyang zhe.

Ta de jixiang zhi yi shi: Ta paiqian feng [zai jiangyu qian] baoxi, yibian ta shi nimen changshi ta de enhui [yushui], yibian chuanbo feng ta de mingling hangxing, yibian nimen xunqiu ta de enhui, yibian nimen gan'en [zhu].
Zai ni [mu sheng] zhiqian, wo que yi paiqian shizhemen qu jiaohua gezi de zuren. Naxie shizhe yi daizhe mingzheng daoda tamen. Ranhou, wo chengfale fanzui zhe. Yuanzhu xinshi shi wo de zeren.

Shi an la paiqian feng, rang feng ji qi yun, ranhou yi ta [an la] de yiyu sanbu tiankong, ranhou fencheng shu pian, yushi ni kanjian yudian congzhong luoxia. Dang ta shi yu luo zai tasuo yiyu de puren shang shi, tamen mashang huanxin guwu,
suiran ciqian——jiangyu zhiqian, tamen shi juewang de.
Ni guancha an la de enhui de xiaoguo ba! Ta zenyang shi kusi de da di fusu.[Fuhuo ri] ta dique neng shi sizhe fuhuo. Ta dui wanshi shi wanneng de.
Jiaru wo paiqian yizhenfeng [qu huihuai zhang de maosheng de zhuangjia], tamen kanjian [ziji de zhuangjia] bian huangle, tamen xinxi zhihou [yin gu en] you bian cheng liao bu xinyang zhe.
Ni [mu sheng] jue buneng shi sizhe [zhu] tingjian [ni de xuanjiao], ye jue buneng shi zhuanshen likai de longzi tingjian ni de zhaohuan.
Ni geng buneng yindao xiazi tuoli tamen de mi wu. Ni zhi neng shi xinyang wo de qishi zhe tingjian ni de xuanjiao, yinwei tamen shi guishun zhe [musilin].
